name: Portalscape
description:
Welcome to Portalscape!

What is Portalscape?

Portalscape is a 2D platformer game where you needs to reach to the portals that are at the end of each level to complete that level while avoiding the enemies (and hazards). 

What does this version of the game contains?

In this version of the game, there are 6 playable levels. Each contain different sorts of experience to player. Some levels contain different type of hazards. 

What is the objective?

The objective is to gather as much as coin without run out of player health. Coins and health pickups distributed around the level to be found and picked up by player. 

Assets that are used in this project:
  • 2D Platfrom Tile Set - Cave
  • Free Platformer Tileset
  • Mine Tileset
  • Pixel Art Platformer - Village Props
  • Simple Heart Health System
  • Sunny Land

Most of the musics are from Juhani Junkala, you can check him out. He's got very interesting projects. Download link for music.

Developing process:

Say hello to my first "refined" unity game project. It started with learning unity by making TileVania by using the course named Complete C# Unity Game Developer 2D. I've learned so much with that course. After that, I've turned this TileVania prototype that I've had into a course project in my university. I've worked with a friend of mine together and added several levels into the project. Lastly, I've changed the assets into royalty free ones so that I can publish this project of mine. What you are seeing now is the final version of this project.
